name: Soldier Runner
description:
A little project I was working on after work-time.
Its an endless runner with increasing hardness over time.
Slide under the rotating blade pillars, parry chandeliers with your sword, light your way with magic, gather mana with smashing pots.
Try to bead your highscore.

Controls:
- move with arrows left and right
- space jump
- left shift slide
- 'Y' key light spell
- 'X' key slice with your sword
- escape pause
Have fun!
